item.title: Royal Caribbean’s stock soars as people keep booking cruises at a record pace
item.description: Royal Caribbean’s stock was having its best day in years after the cruise operator’s full-year profit and revenue outlooks were above Wall Street fore...

item.title: The maid of honor won’t put expenses on her credit card for the bachelorette party. As a bridesmaid, should I be offering?
item.description: “I still haven’t been reimbursed for the cabin deposit I paid for the wedding weekend.”

item.title: U.S. oil prices surge by nearly 5% on bets that U.S. strike on Iran is imminent
item.description: Oil prices rallied Thursday by nearly 5%, with the global benchmark touching its highest level since July as tensions between the U.S. and Iran worsen...

item.title: Why Microsoft’s stock is getting punished after earnings
item.description: Investors focused on the balance between AI spending and AI revenue wanted more juice from Microsoft’s cloud business in the latest quarter.

item.title: Meet the teen investors building a path to the new American dream
item.description: As more kids invest, new ‘Trump accounts’ are poised to make it even easier.
